Project:

Transmedia album '111'

Find out more ▶
About:

My second album under 'eleven tigers' alias, result of a crowdfunded and collaborative action. I was involved in every stage of the project, including concept development, production, marketing and even logistics. Probably one of the most challenging projects I've ever undertaken.

Other projects:

Built on Skeleton framework. Huge thanks to Edie Freedman from O'Reilly Media for design inspiration.
